type: Renovation and repair of commercial and office buildings
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is soliciting bids for a two-phase renovation project at Stony Mountain Institution. The project includes a retrofit of the Minimum Security Health Services unit, located in Building F-34, Stony Mountain Institution, Manitoba. The contractor will complete the work prior to October 20, 2023.
full_summary:
**Phase 1 Invitation to Qualify: CSC Minimum Health Services Retrofit**
============================================================

**Tender Information**
----------------

*   **Reference Number:** WS3615392155-Doc3615438264
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3615392155
*   **Publication Date:** October 13, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** October 27, 2022, at 14:00 MDT
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)

**Project Overview**
----------------

The Contract comprises a retrofit for the Minimum Security Health Services located at Stony Mountain Institution, MB. Demolition and reconstruction of approximately 130 m² of space currently used as a health service center in Building F34. The project involves detailed construction phasing and planning to minimize disruption to healthcare services.

**Tender Description**
------------------

This is the first phase of a two-phase solicitation process. Phase one evaluates the qualifications of all interested suppliers. The second phase will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on specifications and drawings. The tender process is as follows:

*   Phase 1: Invitation to Qualify (Qualification evaluation)
*   Phase 2: Request for Price Quotations (RFQ) and Award of Contract (Contract Award)

**Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------

For Phase 1, the Government will evaluate the qualifications of all registered bidders based on the following criteria:

*   Business Registry information
*   Bidder's Certification
*   relevant experience in construction projects

**Notice Information**
-------------------

For details on this tender, please refer to the SAP Ariba Discovery posting. The posting can be found at the following link: [insert link]

**Contact Information**
--------------------

For queries related to this tender, please contact Vinay Singh at (SPAC/PSPC) at [vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date of October 27, 2022, at 14:00 MDT to be considered. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. 



Note - The dates mentioned above were taken from the original document. Please verify those dates for accuracy. Also, please review this rewritten
